xmlservice.XmlService.name: XmlService
xmlservice.XmlService.doc: This service allows scripts to parse, navigate, and programmatically create XML documents.

property.name: ContentTypes
property.doc: An enumeration representing the types of XML content nodes.

method.name: createCdata
method.doc: Creates an unattached CDATASection node with the given value.

method.name: createComment
method.doc: Creates an unattached Comment node with the given value.

method.name: createDocType
method.doc: Creates an unattached DocumentType node for the root Element node with the given name.

argument.name: elementName
argument.doc: the name of the root Element node to specify in the DocType declaration

method.name: createDocType
method.doc: Creates an unattached DocumentType node for the root Element node with the given name, and the given system ID for the external subset data.

argument.name: elementName
argument.doc: the name of the root Element node to specify in the DocType declaration

argument.name: systemId
argument.doc: the system ID of the external subset data to set

method.name: createDocType
method.doc: Creates an unattached DocumentType node for the root Element node with the given name, and the given public ID and system ID for the external subset data.

argument.name: elementName
argument.doc: the name of the root Element node to specify in the DocType declaration

argument.name: publicId
argument.doc: the public ID of the external subset data to set

argument.name: systemId
argument.doc: the system ID of the external subset data to set

method.name: createDocument
method.doc: Creates an empty XML document.

method.name: createDocument
method.doc: Creates an XML document with the given root Element node.

argument.name: rootElement
argument.doc: the root Element node to set

method.name: createElement
method.doc: Creates an unattached Element node with the given local name and no namespace.

method.name: createElement
method.doc: Creates an unattached Element node with the given local name and namespace.

method.name: createText
method.doc: Creates an unattached Text node with the given value.

method.name: getCompactFormat
method.doc: Creates a Format object for outputting a compact XML document.

method.name: getNamespace
method.doc: Creates a Namespace with the given URI.

method.name: getNamespace
method.doc: Creates a Namespace with the given prefix and URI.

method.name: getNoNamespace
method.doc: Creates a Namespace that represents the absence of a real namespace.

method.name: getPrettyFormat
method.doc: Creates a Format object for outputting a human-readable XML document.

method.name: getRawFormat
method.doc: Creates a Format object for outputting a raw XML document.

method.name: getXmlNamespace
method.doc: Creates a Namespace with the standard xml prefix.

method.name: parse
method.doc: Creates an Document from the given XML, without validating the XML.

xmlservice.Attribute.name: Attribute
xmlservice.Attribute.doc: A representation of an XML attribute.

method.name: getName
method.doc: Gets the local name of the attribute.

method.name: getNamespace
method.doc: Gets the namespace for the attribute.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the value of the attribute.

method.name: setName
method.doc: Sets the local name of the attribute.

method.name: setNamespace
method.doc: Sets the namespace for the attribute.

method.name: setValue
method.doc: Sets the value of the attribute.

xmlservice.Cdata.name: Cdata
xmlservice.Cdata.doc: A representation of an XML CDATASection node.

method.name: append
method.doc: Appends the given text to any content that already exists in the node.

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the text to append to the node

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getText
method.doc: Gets the text value of the Text node.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: setText
method.doc: Sets the text value of the Text node.

xmlservice.Comment.name: Comment
xmlservice.Comment.doc: A representation of an XML Comment node.

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getText
method.doc: Gets the text value of the Comment node.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: setText
method.doc: Sets the text value of the Comment node.

xmlservice.DocType.name: DocType
xmlservice.DocType.doc: A representation of an XML DocumentType node.

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getElementName
method.doc: Gets the name of the root Element node specified in the DocType declaration.

method.name: getInternalSubset
method.doc: Gets the internal subset data for the DocumentType node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getPublicId
method.doc: Gets the public ID of the external subset data for the DocumentType node.

method.name: getSystemId
method.doc: Gets the system ID of the external subset data for the DocumentType node.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: setElementName
method.doc: Sets the name of the root Element node to specify in the DocType declaration.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the root Element node to specify in the DocType declaration

method.name: setInternalSubset
method.doc: Sets the internal subset data for the DocumentType node.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the internal subset data to set

method.name: setPublicId
method.doc: Sets the public ID of the external subset data for the DocumentType node.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the public ID of the external subset data to set

method.name: setSystemId
method.doc: Sets the system ID of the external subset data for the DocumentType node.

argument.name: id
argument.doc: the system ID of the external subset data to set

xmlservice.Document.name: Document
xmlservice.Document.doc: A representation of an XML document.

method.name: addContent
method.doc: Appends the given node to the end of the document.

method.name: addContent
method.doc: Inserts the given node at the given index among all nodes that are immediate children of the document.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the index at which to insert the node among all nodes that are immediate children of the document

method.name: cloneContent
method.doc: Creates unattached copies of all nodes that are immediate children of the document.

method.name: detachRootElement
method.doc: Detaches and returns the document's root Element node.

method.name: getAllContent
method.doc: Gets all nodes that are immediate children of the document.

method.name: getContent
method.doc: Gets the node at the given index among all nodes that are immediate children of the document.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the index for the node among all nodes that are immediate children of the document

method.name: getContentSize
method.doc: Gets the number of nodes that are immediate children of the document.

method.name: getDescendants
method.doc: Gets all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the document, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: getDocType
method.doc: Gets the document's DocType declaration.

method.name: getRootElement
method.doc: Gets the document's root Element node.

method.name: hasRootElement
method.doc: Determines whether the document has a root Element node.

method.name: removeContent
method.doc: Removes all nodes that are immediate children of the document.

method.name: removeContent
method.doc: Removes the given node, if the node is an immediate child of the document.

method.name: removeContent
method.doc: Removes the node at the given index among all nodes that are immediate children of the document.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the index for the node among all nodes that are immediate children of the document

method.name: setDocType
method.doc: Sets the document's DocType declaration.

method.name: setRootElement
method.doc: Sets the document's root Element node.

argument.name: element
argument.doc: the root Element node to set

xmlservice.Element.name: Element
xmlservice.Element.doc: A representation of an XML Element node.

method.name: addContent
method.doc: Appends the given node as the last child of the Element node.

method.name: addContent
method.doc: Inserts the given node at the given index among all nodes that are immediate children of the Element node.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the index at which to insert the node among all nodes that are immediate children of the Element node

method.name: cloneContent
method.doc: Creates unattached copies of all nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node.

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getAllContent
method.doc: Gets all nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node.

method.name: getAttribute
method.doc: Gets the attribute for this Element node with the given name and no namespace.

method.name: getAttribute
method.doc: Gets the attribute for this Element node with the given name and namespace.

method.name: getAttributes
method.doc: Gets all attributes for this Element node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: getChild
method.doc: Gets the first Element node with the given name and no namespace that is an immediate child of this Element node.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the child Element node

method.name: getChild
method.doc: Gets the first Element node with the given name and namespace that is an immediate child of this Element node.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the child Element node

argument.name: namespace
argument.doc: the namespace of the child Element node

method.name: getChildText
method.doc: Gets the text value of the node with the given name and no namespace, if the node is an immediate child of the Element node.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the child node

method.name: getChildText
method.doc: Gets the text value of the node with the given name and namespace, if the node is an immediate child of the Element node.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the child node

argument.name: namespace
argument.doc: the namespace of the child node

method.name: getChildren
method.doc: Gets all Element nodes that are immediate children of this Element node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: getChildren
method.doc: Gets all Element nodes with the given name and no namespace that are immediate children of this Element node, in the order they appear in the document.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the child Element nodes

method.name: getChildren
method.doc: Gets all Element nodes with the given name and namespace that are immediate children of this Element node, in the order they appear in the document.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the child Element nodes

argument.name: namespace
argument.doc: the namespace of the child Element nodes

method.name: getContent
method.doc: Gets the node at the given index among all nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the index for the node among all nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node

method.name: getContentSize
method.doc: Gets the number of nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node.

method.name: getDescendants
method.doc: Gets all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the {@code Element} node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: getDocument
method.doc: Gets the XML document that contains the {@code Element} node.

method.name: getName
method.doc: Gets the local name of the Element node.

method.name: getNamespace
method.doc: Gets the namespace for the Element node.

method.name: getNamespace
method.doc: Gets the namespace with the given prefix for the Element node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getQualifiedName
method.doc: Gets the local name and namespace prefix of the Element node, in the form [namespacePrefix]:[localName].

method.name: getText
method.doc: Gets the text value of the Element node.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: isAncestorOf
method.doc: Determines whether this Element node is a direct or indirect parent of a given Element node.

method.name: isRootElement
method.doc: Determines whether the Element node is the document's root node.

method.name: removeAttribute
method.doc: Removes the given attribute for this Element node, if such an attribute exists.

method.name: removeAttribute
method.doc: Removes the attribute for this Element node with the given name and no namespace, if such an attribute exists.

method.name: removeAttribute
method.doc: Removes the attribute for this Element node with the given name and namespace, if such an attribute exists.

method.name: removeContent
method.doc: Removes all nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node.

method.name: removeContent
method.doc: Removes the given node, if the node is an immediate child of the {@code Element} node.

method.name: removeContent
method.doc: Removes the node at the given index among all nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node.

argument.name: index
argument.doc: the index for the node among all nodes that are immediate children of the {@code Element} node

method.name: setAttribute
method.doc: Sets the given attribute for this Element node.

method.name: setAttribute
method.doc: Sets the attribute for this Element node with the given name, value, and no namespace.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the attribute to set

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the value of the attribute to set

method.name: setAttribute
method.doc: Sets the attribute for this Element node with the given name, value, and namespace.

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the attribute to set

argument.name: value
argument.doc: the value of the attribute to set

argument.name: namespace
argument.doc: the namespace of the attribute to set

method.name: setName
method.doc: Sets the local name of the Element node.

method.name: setNamespace
method.doc: Sets the namespace for the Element node.

method.name: setText
method.doc: Sets the text value of the Element node.

xmlservice.EntityRef.name: EntityRef
xmlservice.EntityRef.doc: A representation of an XML EntityReference node.

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getName
method.doc: Gets the name of the EntityReference node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getPublicId
method.doc: Gets the public ID of the EntityReference node.

method.name: getSystemId
method.doc: Gets the system ID of the EntityReference node.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: setName
method.doc: Sets the name of the EntityReference node.

method.name: setPublicId
method.doc: Sets the public ID of the EntityReference node.

method.name: setSystemId
method.doc: Sets the system ID of the EntityReference node.

xmlservice.Format.name: Format
xmlservice.Format.doc: A formatter for outputting an XML document, with three pre-defined formats that can be further customized.

method.name: format
method.doc: Outputs the given Document as a formatted string.

method.name: format
method.doc: Outputs the given Element node as a formatted string.

method.name: setEncoding
method.doc: Sets the character encoding that the formatter should use.

method.name: setIndent
method.doc: Sets the string used to indent child nodes relative to their parents.

method.name: setLineSeparator
method.doc: Sets the string to insert whenever the formatter would normally insert a line break.

method.name: setOmitDeclaration
method.doc: Sets whether the formatter should omit the XML declaration, such as <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>.

argument.name: omitDeclaration
argument.doc: true to omit the XML declaration; false to include it

method.name: setOmitEncoding
method.doc: Sets whether the formatter should omit the encoding in the XML declaration, such as the encoding field in <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>.

argument.name: omitEncoding
argument.doc: true to omit the encoding in the XML declaration; false to include it

xmlservice.Namespace.name: Namespace
xmlservice.Namespace.doc: A representation of an XML namespace.

method.name: getPrefix
method.doc: Gets the prefix for the namespace.

method.name: getURI
method.doc: Gets the URI for the namespace.

xmlservice.ProcessingInstruction.name: ProcessingInstruction
xmlservice.ProcessingInstruction.doc: A representation of an XML ProcessingInstruction node.

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getData
method.doc: Gets the raw data for every instruction in the ProcessingInstruction node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getTarget
method.doc: Gets the target for the ProcessingInstruction node.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

xmlservice.Text.name: Text
xmlservice.Text.doc: A representation of an XML Text node.

method.name: append
method.doc: Appends the given text to any content that already exists in the node.

argument.name: text
argument.doc: the text to append to the node

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getText
method.doc: Gets the text value of the Text node.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

method.name: setText
method.doc: Sets the text value of the Text node.

xmlservice.Content.name: Content
xmlservice.Content.doc: A representation of a generic XML node.

method.name: asCdata
method.doc: Casts the node as a CDATASection node for the purposes of autocomplete.

method.name: asComment
method.doc: Casts the node as a Comment node for the purposes of autocomplete.

method.name: asDocType
method.doc: Casts the node as a DocumentType node for the purposes of autocomplete.

method.name: asElement
method.doc: Casts the node as an Element node for the purposes of autocomplete.

method.name: asEntityRef
method.doc: Casts the node as a EntityReference node for the purposes of autocomplete.

method.name: asProcessingInstruction
method.doc: Casts the node as a ProcessingInstruction node for the purposes of autocomplete.

method.name: asText
method.doc: Casts the node as a Text node for the purposes of autocomplete.

method.name: detach
method.doc: Detaches the node from its parent Element node.

method.name: getParentElement
method.doc: Gets the node's parent Element node.

method.name: getType
method.doc: Gets the node's content type.

method.name: getValue
method.doc: Gets the text value of all nodes that are direct or indirect children of the node, in the order they appear in the document.

xmlservice.ContentType.name: ContentType
xmlservice.ContentType.doc: An enumeration representing the types of XML content nodes.
